statements: DELETE FROM follow_up_emails WHERE customer_id = 100 AND send_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM follow_up_emails WHERE customer_id = 100 AND send_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_logs WHERE email_opened = true;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM email_logs WHERE email_opened = TRUE AND email_clicked = FALSE;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE last_activity < '2022-01-01' AND name IS NULL;
DELETE FROM customer_actions WHERE action_id = 10 AND action_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 5 OR template_name = 'Welcome Email';
DELETE FROM click_events WHERE url LIKE '%example.com%';
